Hi there, My name is Adelaide!

I am a current PhD student at Univeristy of Califorani, Santa Barbara's [Ecology Evolution and Marine Biology](https://www.eemb.ucsb.edu/academics/graduate){target="_blank"} (EEMB) department as a member of Hillary Young's [Lab](https://young-lab.eemb.ucsb.edu/){target="_blank"} studying the relationships between benthic community structure and ecosystem resilience in coral reef and kelp forest ecosystems. 

This website is designed to facilitate interaction so please click around and explore resources and information!
